lead_paragraph: The government on Thursday dissolved the national examination board and will arrest its members after they were implicated in widespread cheating, officials said.

headline.print_headline: Kenya: Exam Board Linked to Cheating
headline.main: Kenya: Exam Board Linked to Cheating on College Entrance Tests

snippet: The government on Thursday dissolved the national examination board and will arrest its members after they were implicated in widespread cheating, officials said.
